<script type="text/javascript">
    var $j = jQuery.noConflict();
    $j(document).ready(function () {
        $j("#mainCarrousel").cycle({
            pager: "#mainCarrouselPager",
            timeout: 4000,
            pause: 1,
            pagerAnchorBuilder: function (idx, slide) {
                return '<li><span class="mainCarrouselPager-category">' + $j(slide).find(".slide-category").html() + '</span><a href="#">' + $j(slide).find(".slide-pager-title").html() + '</a></li>';
            }
        });

        $j("#mainCarrouselPager").find(" li:last").attr("style", "border-bottom:none");
        $j(".slide-container").each(function (index, element) {
            //alert(index);
            var slideShadowOpacity = ($j(element).find(".slide-shadow-opacity").html());
            try {
                slideShadowOpacity = 100 - slideShadowOpacity;
                var opacityNoIE = slideShadowOpacity / 100;
                $j(element).find(".slide-shadow").attr("style", "filter:alpha(opacity=" + slideShadowOpacity + ");opacity:" + opacityNoIE + ";");
            }
            catch (err) {
            }
        });

        //Carrousel Controls
        $j("#prev-car").click(function () {
            $j('#mainCarrousel').cycle('prev');
        });

        $j("#pause-car").click(function () {
            $j('#mainCarrousel').cycle('pause');
        });

        $j("#resume-car").click(function () {
            $j('#mainCarrousel').cycle('resume');
        });

        $j("#next-car").click(function () {
            $j('#mainCarrousel').cycle('next');
        });

        //pauses the carousel when user click in gold box title
        $j('#mainCarrouselContainer #mainCarrouselPager li').click(function () {
            $j('#mainCarrousel').cycle('pause');
        })
    });
</script>

                                    Electronic Field Trip brings vivid local stories to life</h2>
                                <p class="date">
                                    Sign up for field trip on Feb. 22 at 7am or 10am - see story for details
                                </p>
                                <p>
                                    As a young African American woman living in Oakland during World War II, Betty Soskin learned firsthand about the racial discrimination black Americans faced then. Now, at age 96, Soskin has the insight and wisdom to put it into perspective.
                                </p>
                                <div class="options optionsLeft">

                                </p>
                                <p>
